text: Approval for the addition of the 7 mm stent length (in all diameters, 2.0, 2.25 and 2.5 mm) and 2.25 mm diameter biodivysio sv otw product to previously approved stent lengths of 10, 15 and 18 mm (supplement 3).  The device, as modified, will be marketed under the trade name biodivysio sv otw and is indicated for:  "improving coronary luminal diameter in subjects experiencing abrupt closure or threatened abrupt vessel closure following percutaneous revascularization of de novo or non in-stent restenotic native coronary artery lesions (length of lesion and/or dissection <=25 mm) with reference vessel diameter ranging from >=2.0 mm to <=2.75 mm by visual estimate.  Long-term outcome (beyond 6 months) for this implant is unknown at present.
